title: How To Make $10,000 a Month: 16 Real Ways
description: Want to learn how to make $10,000 a month? Making $10,000 a month can change your life. I still remember the first time I reached this monthly income level – I couldn’t believe it! It was a game-changer that helped me pay off debt, save for my future, and finally feel more in control of... The post How To Make $10,000 a Month: 16 Real Ways appeared first on Making Sense Of Cents.
author: Michelle Schroeder-Gardner
excerpt: Want to learn how to make $10,000 a month? Here are 16 ways to make $10K a month from home, by starting your own business, and even with stocks!
text: Want to learn how to make $10,000 a month? Making $10,000 a month can change your life. I still remember the first time I reached this monthly income level – I couldn’t believe it! It was a game-changer that helped me pay off debt, save for my future, and finally feel more in control of… Want to learn how to make $10,000 a month? Making $10,000 a month can change your life. I still remember the first time I reached this monthly income level – I couldn’t believe it! It was a game-changer that helped me pay off debt, save for my future, and finally feel more in control of my finances. It’s a goal that may feel far off, but with the right steps, it’s absolutely achievable. Many people dream of earning this much but aren’t sure how to get there. There are many ways to make $10,000 a month, and you don’t need a fancy degree. You just need to pick the right path and work hard. From starting a business to selling services, the options are wide open whether you’re looking to make extra income or if you want to start a new career. Best Ways To Make $10,000 a Month Below is how you can make $10,000 a month! 1. Start a blog and monetize it Starting a blog was one of the best decisions I ever made, and I think it’s one of the best ways to make money online. I still remember the excitement of hitting “publish” on my first post and earning my first $100 – it showed me that blogging could truly change my life. I now make well over $10,000 a month online and have for around one decade now consistently. Starting a blog can be a great way to make $10,000 a month. First, you’ll want to pick a topic you’re passionate about or that you think you’ll like talking about a lot. This could be personal finance, travel, cooking, or anything else you like. Next, set up your blog. Choose a domain name and get hosting – WordPress is a popular platform that’s easy to use. You can find my tutorial here for starting a blog on WordPress. Now it’s time to create content. You will want to write helpful articles that your readers will enjoy, as well as post regularly so that readers keep coming back. To make money, you can try different methods. You can put ads on your site or promote products as an affiliate. Some bloggers sell their own courses or ebooks. I recommend signing up for my How To Start A Blog FREE Course. In this free course, I show you how to create a blog, from the technical side to earning your first income and attracting readers. Over 80,000 people have taken my free course too! 2. Bookkeeping Bookkeeping is a great way to make money from home. You don’t need a degree or lots of experience to get started – this is something that you can learn. Many businesses need help keeping track of their money, and you can be the one to help them. Bookkeepers record money coming in and going out of a business. They also organize receipts and create financial reports. It’s like managing your own budget but for someone else’s business. You can work as a freelance bookkeeper and have multiple clients. This gives you the freedom to set your own schedule. All you need is a computer and internet connection to work from anywhere. Many bookkeepers earn around $40,000 a year or more. You could make $50 to $100 per hour. Some bookkeepers make $300 to $400 a month from just one client, working only 4-5 hours. If you are interested in finding online bookkeeping jobs, I recommend signing up for this free workshop all about finding a virtual bookkeeping job. Here, you will learn how to start a freelance bookkeeping business. You can sign up for free here. Recommended reading: How To Find Online Bookkeeping Jobs 10Bookkeeper Launch CourseThis free training will teach you what you need to know to become a virtual bookkeeper and make money from home. 3. Teach online courses When I created my first online course, I was nervous about whether anyone would sign up. But seeing those first enrollments roll in was an incredible feeling, and knowing my course was helping others made it even more rewarding. I now have had over 10,000 people take my course, and I have been able to help so many people! Teaching online courses can be a great way to make $10,000 a month too. You can share your skills and knowledge with students around the world. You can get started by picking a subject you know well. This could be anything from cooking to coding to traveling and more. Next, plan out your lessons and create engaging content. You might use videos, worksheets, or quizzes to teach your students. A popular site for hosting courses is Teachable, and it is what I personally use for my two courses. This platform makes it easy to set up your course and handle payments. They also have a free workshop that you can take – How Anyone Can Create an Online Course That Sells. One big plus of online courses is that they can bring in passive income. Once you make the course, you can sell it over and over without much extra work. Some teachers earn thousands of dollars each month from just one popular course. Recommended reading: How I’ve Made Over $1,000,000 From My First Course 4. Open an Etsy shop Etsy is a great place to sell handmade items, jewelry, vintage goods, and craft supplies. You can even sell things like a web design or printables on your Etsy store! Etsy is a global platform to sell your work. With millions of active buyers, it’s a great place to connect with people who are looking for unique and high-quality items. I buy on Etsy all the time, and just last week I actually bought a shirt, earrings, a plant pot, and a calendar – all from different Etsy sellers! Promoting your Etsy shop is important for driving traffic and increasing sales. You may want to use social media platforms to showcase your products, share behind-the-scenes content, and interact with potential customers. Running promotions or having discounts during holidays and special occasions can also help increase sales. Recommended reading: How To Sell On Etsy Successfully: A Beginner’s Guide 5. Sell stock photos Selling stock photos can be a great way to make extra money. Some photographers earn $500 to $10,000 per month from stock photo sales. I buy stock photos all the time for my business (you’ll see some stock photos in this blog post that you’re reading right now actually!). To get started, take high-quality photos of different subjects, and you can focus on popular themes like nature, business, technology, and travel. Then, upload your best shots to stock photo websites like Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, Deposit Photos, or Getty Images. These sites connect you with buyers looking for images (buyers can simply browse these sites and look for pictures that are related to the topic they need). You’ll want to build a large portfolio of diverse images as this increases your chance of someone downloading your photo. Top earners often have thousands of photos for sale. Recommended reading: 18 Ways To Get Paid To Take Pictures 6. Start a YouTube channel Want to make money on YouTube? It’s possible! Many people earn a good income from their channels. To get started, pick a topic you love. This could be cooking, travel, gaming, or anything else. There are thousands of different niches you could get into and I have watched videos on all sorts of topics. Even ones that seem fairly small (like Alaska homesteading) have millions of views! People like to watch videos on all sorts of topics. Next, create your channel. Come up with a catchy name and make an eye-catching profile picture. Then, start making videos. You don’t need fancy equipment at first – your cell phone can work just fine. Remember, it takes time to build a successful channel. Don’t give up if you don’t see results right away. Keep making great content and engaging with your viewers. With hard work and patience, you could earn $10,000 a month or more from YouTube! Recommended reading: How Much Do YouTubers Make? 7. Become a freelance writer When I first started freelance writing, I didn’t know where it would lead, but landing my first paid gig felt like a huge win. Over time, writing became a flexible and rewarding way to earn money while working on my own terms. Freelance writing can be a great way to make $10,000 a month too. As a freelance writer, you work for yourself and write for different clients. You might write blog posts, articles, or website content. Many businesses need writers. They want to share information online but don’t have time to write it themselves. That’s where you come in! Recommended reading: 14 Places To Find Freelance Writing Jobs – (Start With No Experience!) 8. Invest in rental properties There are many different real estate side hustles, and one is to invest in rental properties. Rental properties can be a great way to make $10,000 a month. You can buy homes or apartments and rent them out to tenants, or even get into commercial real estate. The key to making money as a real estate investor is to find properties that will bring in more money than they cost you. Look for places in good areas where people want to live or shop. Aim to charge enough rent to cover your mortgage, taxes, insurance, and repairs, plus extra for profit. For example, you might collect $1,800 in rent and have $800 in expenses. That leaves $1,000 profit each month. To reach $10,000 monthly, you’d need about 10 properties like this. It takes time to build up, but rental income can grow into a big moneymaker. Just be ready to deal with tenant issues and property upkeep. Remember to save some of your profits for times when you have no renters or need to make big repairs (such as if there’s a leak or if the AC breaks). Recommended reading: How This 34 Year Old Owns 7 Rental Homes 9. Flip items for profit When I first started flipping items, I was amazed at how quickly I could turn a small investment into a profit. Finding hidden gems at thrift stores (or even just in my very own closet) and seeing them sell for much more online became not only a fun challenge but also a reliable way to make extra money. So, what is flipping exactly? This is where you buy things at low prices and sell them for more. This can help you earn $10,000 a month if you do it right. You can look for items at yard sales, thrift stores, or flea markets. You can find good deals there and then sell these items online or at local markets for higher prices. Popular things to flip include furniture, electronics, and clothes. Shoes, especially sneakers, can also be very profitable. Some people make thousands of dollars just from flipping shoes, for example. Recommended reading: How Melissa Made $40,000 In One Year Flipping Items 10. Become a virtual assistant I used to work as a virtual assistant, and it was one of the best decisions I’ve made. It not only helped me earn money on a flexible schedule but also taught me the skills and confidence I needed to eventually build my own successful business. Plus, I think it’s a great way to work from home and make extra money. Virtual assistants help business owners with tasks they need to get done. This job lets you work online and set your own schedule. Virtual assistants do all kinds of work. They might manage social media accounts, plan events, help with SEO (search engine optimization), handle email marketing or content marketing, or answer emails. Some VAs even help with bookkeeping or customer service. You can look for jobs on sites like Fiverr or Upwork. You can also reach out to bloggers or small business owners directly. As a beginner, you might make around $15 to $25 per hour. But with experience, you could earn much more. Some skilled VAs make over $10,000 a month! Recommended reading: Best Ways To Find Virtual Assistant Jobs 11. Create digital products Digital products can be a great way to make $10,000 a month from home. These are items you create once and sell many times over. Some examples of digital products you can create include ebooks, online courses, templates, and printables. Recommended reading: How I Make Money Selling Printables On Etsy 12. Invest in dividend stocks When I started investing in dividend stocks, I loved seeing those payouts hit my account – it felt like getting rewarded just for being consistent. Over time, those payments grew, showing me how powerful dividend investing can be for creating steady, passive income. Dividend stocks can help you earn money each month too. These are stocks from companies that share some of their profits with shareholders. To make $10,000 a month from dividends, you’d need to invest a lot of money. You might need around $4 million if the stocks pay 3% in dividends each year. As you invest more, your dividend income will grow. It might take a while to reach $10,000 a month, but every bit helps. Recommended reading: What Are Dividends & How Do They Work? A Beginner’s Guide 13. Affiliate marketing When I first started affiliate marketing, I was amazed at how I could earn money just by sharing products I loved and used myself. Over time, it became one of my favorite ways to earn income because it felt so natural to recommend things that genuinely helped others. Affiliate marketing can help you make $10,000 a month too. Affiliate marketing is where you promote other people’s products and earn a commission when someone buys through your link. You can share affiliate links (also known as referral links) on your website, on social media, in emails, and more. And, there are affiliate links for everything out there – books, kitchen gear, clothing, furniture, travel, and even food! Recommended reading: What You Need To Know About Affiliate Marketing For Beginners 14. Create a membership site A membership site is a place where people pay to access special content or services online. You can sell things like online courses, videos, a forum, or expert advice. Membership sites can be on all different kinds of topics, such as personal finance, fitness, hobbies, crafts, business, travel, and more. You can set different price levels for your membership. Some people might pay $10 a month, while others could pay $50+ for more features. To make $10,000 a month, you’d need 1,000 members at $10 each or 100 members at $100 each. For example, I know someone who has a membership site for moms. In it, they have a forum for moms to ask questions and talk to one another. They also give a binder with helpful printables to manage a household, weekly meal plans, expert speakers who come in occasionally and host webinars, and more. Moms pay around $10 a month for this membership site and they have hundreds (maybe thousands?) of paying members each month! 15. Sell print on demand products If you want to make money without storing inventory, you should try selling print-on-demand products! This business lets you create custom items like T-shirts, mugs, and phone cases. You design the products, and a partner company, such as Printify, makes them when customers order (they’ll handle the printing and shipping for you). It’s that simple! You don’t have to worry about packaging or shipping anything yourself. As your business grows, you can possibly make $500 to $1,500 (or much more!) in monthly profit as a side hustle. Some full-time sellers even earn $50,000+ a year! Recommended reading: How I Make $1,500 Monthly With My Print-On-Demand Business 10Print-On-Demand Free GuideThis freebie will teach you about print-on-demand as well as give you a list of 17 hot-selling products you can sell via print on demand. 16. Write ebooks Writing ebooks can be a way to make $10,000 a month by sharing your knowledge on topics you’re passionate about or through stories that you’ve created, and earning money from it. Once your ebook is ready, you can sell it on platforms like Amazon. You can also sell it on your own website if you have one. One very popular niche to get into right now is romance novels. You can learn more at How to Make Money Self-Publishing Short Romance Novels on Amazon. Frequently Asked Questions Many people want to know how to earn $10,000 a month. Here are answers to some common questions about reaching this income goal. How can I make $10K a month? You can make $10,000 a month through different ways such as starting a blog and making money from ads and sponsors, selling bookkeeping services to small businesses, teaching online courses about topics you know well, opening an Etsy shop to sell handmade items, selling stock photos, and more. How much money do I need to invest to make $10,000 a month? The amount you need to invest depends on the return rate. If you get a 5% yearly return, you’d need about $2.4 million invested to make $10,000 a month. With a 10% return, you’d need about $1.2 million. These are just rough ideas, so I recommend that you talk to a financial expert for personal advice about the specific thing you want to invest in. How to make $10,000 a month online? You can make $10,000 a month online in several ways, such as by creating a blog about a topic you love and using ads to make money, selling online courses teaching skills you’re good at, doing freelance work like writing or graphic design, starting a YouTube channel and making money from ads, and so much more. How to make $10K a month passive income? Passive income takes time to build but can lead to $10,000 a month. To make $10K a month in passive income, you can sell ebooks that you’ve written, build an online course, buy and run rental properties, invest in dividend-paying stocks, and sell stock photos. How To Make $10,000 a Month – Summary I hope you enjoyed my article on the best ways to make $10,000 a month. Making $10,000 in monthly income may seem like a big goal, but I personally know that it’s possible with the right mindset and effort. Whether you’re starting a blog, flipping items, or diving into affiliate marketing, the key is to stay consistent and focus on opportunities that align with your strengths and interests. It might take time, but reaching this milestone can bring financial freedom and open doors you never imagined. What do you think is the best way to make $10,000 each month? What are your favorite income streams? Recommended reading: Ways To Make An Extra $1,000 A Month 18 Passive Income Ideas To Earn $1,000+ Each Month How To Make An Extra $500 A Month How To Make $100 A Day How To Turn $1,000 Into $10,000 How To Make $1,000 In 24 Hours 15 Best Digital Marketing Side Hustles
html:
Want to learn how to make $10,000 a month? Making $10,000 a month can change your life. I still remember the first time I reached this monthly income level – I couldn’t believe it! It was a game-changer that helped me pay off debt, save for my future, and finally feel more in control of…

Want to learn how to make $10,000 a month?

Making $10,000 a month can change your life. I still remember the first time I reached this monthly income level – I couldn’t believe it! It was a game-changer that helped me pay off debt, save for my future, and finally feel more in control of my finances.

It’s a goal that may feel far off, but with the right steps, it’s absolutely achievable. Many people dream of earning this much but aren’t sure how to get there.

There are many ways to make $10,000 a month, and you don’t need a fancy degree. You just need to pick the right path and work hard. From starting a business to selling services, the options are wide open whether you’re looking to make extra income or if you want to start a new career.

Best Ways To Make $10,000 a Month

Below is how you can make $10,000 a month!

1. Start a blog and monetize it

Starting a blog was one of the best decisions I ever made, and I think it’s one of the best ways to make money online.

I still remember the excitement of hitting “publish” on my first post and earning my first $100 – it showed me that blogging could truly change my life. I now make well over $10,000 a month online and have for around one decade now consistently.

Starting a blog can be a great way to make $10,000 a month. First, you’ll want to pick a topic you’re passionate about or that you think you’ll like talking about a lot. This could be personal finance, travel, cooking, or anything else you like.

Next, set up your blog. Choose a domain name and get hosting – WordPress is a popular platform that’s easy to use. You can find my tutorial here for starting a blog on WordPress.

Now it’s time to create content. You will want to write helpful articles that your readers will enjoy, as well as post regularly so that readers keep coming back.

To make money, you can try different methods. You can put ads on your site or promote products as an affiliate. Some bloggers sell their own courses or ebooks.

I recommend signing up for my How To Start A Blog FREE Course. In this free course, I show you how to create a blog, from the technical side to earning your first income and attracting readers. Over 80,000 people have taken my free course too!

2. Bookkeeping

Bookkeeping is a great way to make money from home. You don’t need a degree or lots of experience to get started – this is something that you can learn. Many businesses need help keeping track of their money, and you can be the one to help them.

Bookkeepers record money coming in and going out of a business. They also organize receipts and create financial reports. It’s like managing your own budget but for someone else’s business.

You can work as a freelance bookkeeper and have multiple clients. This gives you the freedom to set your own schedule. All you need is a computer and internet connection to work from anywhere.

Many bookkeepers earn around $40,000 a year or more. You could make $50 to $100 per hour. Some bookkeepers make $300 to $400 a month from just one client, working only 4-5 hours.

If you are interested in finding online bookkeeping jobs, I recommend signing up for this free workshop all about finding a virtual bookkeeping job. Here, you will learn how to start a freelance bookkeeping business. You can sign up for free here.

Recommended reading: How To Find Online Bookkeeping Jobs

10

Bookkeeper Launch Course

This free training will teach you what you need to know to become a virtual bookkeeper and make money from home.

3. Teach online courses

When I created my first online course, I was nervous about whether anyone would sign up. But seeing those first enrollments roll in was an incredible feeling, and knowing my course was helping others made it even more rewarding. I now have had over 10,000 people take my course, and I have been able to help so many people!

Teaching online courses can be a great way to make $10,000 a month too. You can share your skills and knowledge with students around the world.

You can get started by picking a subject you know well. This could be anything from cooking to coding to traveling and more. Next, plan out your lessons and create engaging content. You might use videos, worksheets, or quizzes to teach your students.

A popular site for hosting courses is Teachable, and it is what I personally use for my two courses. This platform makes it easy to set up your course and handle payments. They also have a free workshop that you can take – How Anyone Can Create an Online Course That Sells.

One big plus of online courses is that they can bring in passive income. Once you make the course, you can sell it over and over without much extra work. Some teachers earn thousands of dollars each month from just one popular course.

Recommended reading: How I’ve Made Over $1,000,000 From My First Course

4. Open an Etsy shop

Etsy is a great place to sell handmade items, jewelry, vintage goods, and craft supplies. You can even sell things like a web design or printables on your Etsy store!

Etsy is a global platform to sell your work. With millions of active buyers, it’s a great place to connect with people who are looking for unique and high-quality items.

I buy on Etsy all the time, and just last week I actually bought a shirt, earrings, a plant pot, and a calendar – all from different Etsy sellers!

Promoting your Etsy shop is important for driving traffic and increasing sales. You may want to use social media platforms to showcase your products, share behind-the-scenes content, and interact with potential customers. Running promotions or having discounts during holidays and special occasions can also help increase sales.

Recommended reading: How To Sell On Etsy Successfully: A Beginner’s Guide

5. Sell stock photos

Selling stock photos can be a great way to make extra money. Some photographers earn $500 to $10,000 per month from stock photo sales.

I buy stock photos all the time for my business (you’ll see some stock photos in this blog post that you’re reading right now actually!).

To get started, take high-quality photos of different subjects, and you can focus on popular themes like nature, business, technology, and travel.

Then, upload your best shots to stock photo websites like Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, Deposit Photos, or Getty Images. These sites connect you with buyers looking for images (buyers can simply browse these sites and look for pictures that are related to the topic they need).

You’ll want to build a large portfolio of diverse images as this increases your chance of someone downloading your photo. Top earners often have thousands of photos for sale.

Recommended reading: 18 Ways To Get Paid To Take Pictures

6. Start a YouTube channel

Want to make money on YouTube? It’s possible! Many people earn a good income from their channels.

To get started, pick a topic you love. This could be cooking, travel, gaming, or anything else. There are thousands of different niches you could get into and I have watched videos on all sorts of topics. Even ones that seem fairly small (like Alaska homesteading) have millions of views! People like to watch videos on all sorts of topics.

Next, create your channel. Come up with a catchy name and make an eye-catching profile picture. Then, start making videos. You don’t need fancy equipment at first – your cell phone can work just fine.

Remember, it takes time to build a successful channel. Don’t give up if you don’t see results right away. Keep making great content and engaging with your viewers. With hard work and patience, you could earn $10,000 a month or more from YouTube!

Recommended reading: How Much Do YouTubers Make?

7. Become a freelance writer

When I first started freelance writing, I didn’t know where it would lead, but landing my first paid gig felt like a huge win. Over time, writing became a flexible and rewarding way to earn money while working on my own terms.

Freelance writing can be a great way to make $10,000 a month too. As a freelance writer, you work for yourself and write for different clients. You might write blog posts, articles, or website content.

Many businesses need writers. They want to share information online but don’t have time to write it themselves. That’s where you come in!

Recommended reading: 14 Places To Find Freelance Writing Jobs – (Start With No Experience!)

8. Invest in rental properties

There are many different real estate side hustles, and one is to invest in rental properties. Rental properties can be a great way to make $10,000 a month. You can buy homes or apartments and rent them out to tenants, or even get into commercial real estate.

The key to making money as a real estate investor is to find properties that will bring in more money than they cost you. Look for places in good areas where people want to live or shop.

Aim to charge enough rent to cover your mortgage, taxes, insurance, and repairs, plus extra for profit. For example, you might collect $1,800 in rent and have $800 in expenses. That leaves $1,000 profit each month. To reach $10,000 monthly, you’d need about 10 properties like this.

It takes time to build up, but rental income can grow into a big moneymaker. Just be ready to deal with tenant issues and property upkeep.

Remember to save some of your profits for times when you have no renters or need to make big repairs (such as if there’s a leak or if the AC breaks).

Recommended reading: How This 34 Year Old Owns 7 Rental Homes

9. Flip items for profit

When I first started flipping items, I was amazed at how quickly I could turn a small investment into a profit. Finding hidden gems at thrift stores (or even just in my very own closet) and seeing them sell for much more online became not only a fun challenge but also a reliable way to make extra money.

So, what is flipping exactly? This is where you buy things at low prices and sell them for more. This can help you earn $10,000 a month if you do it right.

You can look for items at yard sales, thrift stores, or flea markets. You can find good deals there and then sell these items online or at local markets for higher prices.

Popular things to flip include furniture, electronics, and clothes. Shoes, especially sneakers, can also be very profitable. Some people make thousands of dollars just from flipping shoes, for example.

Recommended reading: How Melissa Made $40,000 In One Year Flipping Items

10. Become a virtual assistant

I used to work as a virtual assistant, and it was one of the best decisions I’ve made. It not only helped me earn money on a flexible schedule but also taught me the skills and confidence I needed to eventually build my own successful business. Plus, I think it’s a great way to work from home and make extra money.

Virtual assistants help business owners with tasks they need to get done. This job lets you work online and set your own schedule.

Virtual assistants do all kinds of work. They might manage social media accounts, plan events, help with SEO (search engine optimization), handle email marketing or content marketing, or answer emails. Some VAs even help with bookkeeping or customer service.

You can look for jobs on sites like Fiverr or Upwork. You can also reach out to bloggers or small business owners directly.

As a beginner, you might make around $15 to $25 per hour. But with experience, you could earn much more. Some skilled VAs make over $10,000 a month!

Recommended reading: Best Ways To Find Virtual Assistant Jobs

11. Create digital products

Digital products can be a great way to make $10,000 a month from home. These are items you create once and sell many times over.

Some examples of digital products you can create include ebooks, online courses, templates, and printables.

Recommended reading: How I Make Money Selling Printables On Etsy

12. Invest in dividend stocks

When I started investing in dividend stocks, I loved seeing those payouts hit my account – it felt like getting rewarded just for being consistent. Over time, those payments grew, showing me how powerful dividend investing can be for creating steady, passive income.

Dividend stocks can help you earn money each month too. These are stocks from companies that share some of their profits with shareholders.

To make $10,000 a month from dividends, you’d need to invest a lot of money. You might need around $4 million if the stocks pay 3% in dividends each year.

As you invest more, your dividend income will grow. It might take a while to reach $10,000 a month, but every bit helps.

Recommended reading: What Are Dividends & How Do They Work? A Beginner’s Guide

13. Affiliate marketing

When I first started affiliate marketing, I was amazed at how I could earn money just by sharing products I loved and used myself. Over time, it became one of my favorite ways to earn income because it felt so natural to recommend things that genuinely helped others.

Affiliate marketing can help you make $10,000 a month too. Affiliate marketing is where you promote other people’s products and earn a commission when someone buys through your link.

You can share affiliate links (also known as referral links) on your website, on social media, in emails, and more.

And, there are affiliate links for everything out there – books, kitchen gear, clothing, furniture, travel, and even food!

Recommended reading: What You Need To Know About Affiliate Marketing For Beginners

14. Create a membership site

A membership site is a place where people pay to access special content or services online. You can sell things like online courses, videos, a forum, or expert advice.

Membership sites can be on all different kinds of topics, such as personal finance, fitness, hobbies, crafts, business, travel, and more.

You can set different price levels for your membership. Some people might pay $10 a month, while others could pay $50+ for more features.

To make $10,000 a month, you’d need 1,000 members at $10 each or 100 members at $100 each.

For example, I know someone who has a membership site for moms. In it, they have a forum for moms to ask questions and talk to one another. They also give a binder with helpful printables to manage a household, weekly meal plans, expert speakers who come in occasionally and host webinars, and more. Moms pay around $10 a month for this membership site and they have hundreds (maybe thousands?) of paying members each month!

15. Sell print on demand products

If you want to make money without storing inventory, you should try selling print-on-demand products! This business lets you create custom items like T-shirts, mugs, and phone cases.

You design the products, and a partner company, such as Printify, makes them when customers order (they’ll handle the printing and shipping for you). It’s that simple! You don’t have to worry about packaging or shipping anything yourself.

As your business grows, you can possibly make $500 to $1,500 (or much more!) in monthly profit as a side hustle. Some full-time sellers even earn $50,000+ a year!

16. Write ebooks

Writing ebooks can be a way to make $10,000 a month by sharing your knowledge on topics you’re passionate about or through stories that you’ve created, and earning money from it.

Once your ebook is ready, you can sell it on platforms like Amazon. You can also sell it on your own website if you have one.

Frequently Asked Questions

Many people want to know how to earn $10,000 a month. Here are answers to some common questions about reaching this income goal.

How can I make $10K a month?

You can make $10,000 a month through different ways such as starting a blog and making money from ads and sponsors, selling bookkeeping services to small businesses, teaching online courses about topics you know well, opening an Etsy shop to sell handmade items, selling stock photos, and more.

How much money do I need to invest to make $10,000 a month?

The amount you need to invest depends on the return rate. If you get a 5% yearly return, you’d need about $2.4 million invested to make $10,000 a month. With a 10% return, you’d need about $1.2 million. These are just rough ideas, so I recommend that you talk to a financial expert for personal advice about the specific thing you want to invest in.

How to make $10,000 a month online?

You can make $10,000 a month online in several ways, such as by creating a blog about a topic you love and using ads to make money, selling online courses teaching skills you’re good at, doing freelance work like writing or graphic design, starting a YouTube channel and making money from ads, and so much more.

How to make $10K a month passive income?

Passive income takes time to build but can lead to $10,000 a month. To make $10K a month in passive income, you can sell ebooks that you’ve written, build an online course, buy and run rental properties, invest in dividend-paying stocks, and sell stock photos.

How To Make $10,000 a Month – Summary

I hope you enjoyed my article on the best ways to make $10,000 a month.

Making $10,000 in monthly income may seem like a big goal, but I personally know that it’s possible with the right mindset and effort.

Whether you’re starting a blog, flipping items, or diving into affiliate marketing, the key is to stay consistent and focus on opportunities that align with your strengths and interests. It might take time, but reaching this milestone can bring financial freedom and open doors you never imagined.
